nodes.docs: Creates a new bracket colorizer transformer
tags: options.themes - custom themes; all Shiki built-in themes are supported without additional configuration
options.bracketPairs - bracket definitions; by default [], {}, (), and <> (TS-only)
options.langs - language-specific overrides for themes and bracketPairs

Create a Shiki transformer for VitePress to enable twoslash integration

nodes.docs:
Create a Shiki transformer for VitePress to enable twoslash integration
